description:
Soul is seriously injured and Maka’s fading fast. Death Scythe and Dr. Stein step in to make sure the weird rampage of Crona and Ragnarok comes to an end.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La sorcière Médusa. Le porteur d`une âme maléfique ?
La strega Medusa. Colei che possiede un`anima malefica?
Majo Medusa: Ooinaru Waruki Tamashii o Motsu Mono?
Medusa the Witch: The One Who Possesses a Great Evil Soul?
魔女メデューサ ~大いなる凶[わる]き魂を持つ者?
